original: Nahetuṁ nasārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: na hetum na sa ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka
na hetum na cittam dhammam paṭicca

original: Nahetuṁ nacetasikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: na hetum na cetasikam dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka

original: Nahetuṁ nacittasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nahetuṁ nacittasaṁsaṭṭhaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe…. Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: na hetum na citta sampayuttam dhammam paṭicca pe na hetum na citta sasaṭṭham dhammam paṭicca pe hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka

original: Nahetuṁ nacittasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: na hetum na citta samuṭṭhānam dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka

original: Nahetuṁ nacittasahabhuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nahetuṁ nacittānuparivattiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: na hetum na citta sahabhum dhammam paṭicca pe na hetum na citta anuparivattim dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka

original: Nahetuṁ nacittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nahetuṁ nacittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhuṁ
analyzed: na hetum na citta sa saṭṭha samuṭṭhānam dhammam paṭicca pe na hetum na citta sa saṭṭha samuṭṭhāna sahabhu

original: dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nahetuṁ nacittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
analyzed: dhammam paṭicca pe na hetum na citta sasaṭṭha samuṭṭhāna anuparivattim dhammam paṭicca
saṅkhitta hetuyāḥ ekam pe avigate eka
na hetum na ajjhattikam dhammam paṭicca

original: Nahetuṁ nabāhiraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: na hetum na bāhiram dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka
na hetum na aupādā dhammam paṭicca
na hetum na aupādinnam dhammam paṭicca

original: Nahetuṁ naanupādinnaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: na hetum na anupādinnam dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka

original: Nahetuṁ noupādānaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nahetuṁ nokilesaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe….
analyzed: na hetum no upādānam dhammam paṭicca pe na hetum no kilesam dhammam paṭicca pe
